entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine ServerReset_BeforeRequestBody_ClientBodyThrows #46717
  • gRPC JSON transcoding / Support custom JsonConverter #46712
  • [SignalR - Typescript client] Make the client SSR Frameworks compliant #46708
  • SignalR with singelton service makes client halt under load #46707
  • "Unobserved task exception in sender" in Asp.net core SignalR server #46706
  • Unobserved task exception in SignalR dotnet client #46705
  • [Blazor] Mechanism for rendering a "remote" component on to the page. #46704
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Under certain circumstances, the HttpLogging middleware does not follow the ResponseBodyLogLimit setting #46703
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #46701
  • Add F# webapi template tests #46700
  • Address generating FQN for types in RDF #46694
    8.0-preview3

Closed

  • Using minimal APIs source generator results in null dereference warnings (CS8602) #46446
    8.0-preview2
  • Update CreateSlimBuilder for Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Host.CreateEmptyApplicationBuilder #46293
    8.0-preview2
  • Horizontal tabs causing issues in header values #46543
  • Exception 'GetAuthenticationStateAsync was called before SetAuthenticationState.' thrown when calling AuthenticationStateProvider.GetAuthenticationStateAsync() method #28684
    8.0-preview2
  • Framework does not handle Request cancellation properly #44697
    8.0-preview2
  • Why `Result.ValidationProblem` requires `IDictionary<string, string[]>` instead of `IReadOnlyDictionary<string, string[]>`? #46689
  • Set dynamically @page #46529
  • component dont update the changing value #46634
  • MAUI over the web? #46702
  • Add friendly display name for the Blazor WebAssembly debugging extension for VSCode #33196
    Backlog
  • Quarantine <FAILING_TEST_NAME> #46699
  • Disabling integrity check for "/_framework/dotnet.7.0.2.<random>.js" #46612
  • blazor wasm duplicated requests when using individual account auth #46658
  • < Sammyboy #46697
  • Bigboy #46698
  • Improve the error message when applying [FromXX] on parameters that don't support binding #44218
    8.0-preview2
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943

PullRequests

Created

  • Retry ServerReset_BeforeRequestBody_ClientBodyThrows test #46718
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove JsonSerializerOptions copy in ProblemDetailsJsonOptionsSetup #46716
    area-runtime
  • Expand FromX support and add route vs. query param inference #46715
  • Add 'dotnet new' web item templates (razor view, api controller, mvc controller) #46714
    area-mvc
  • Add short circuit in routing #46713
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • TryParse support for request delegate source generator #46696
    area-runtime
  • Eliminate framework use of 'IJSUnmarshalledRuntime' #46693
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Update CreateSlimBuilder to use Host.CreateEmptyApplicationBuilder. #46579
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview2
  • Update .npmrc approach and locked dependencies #46601
    8.0-preview2
  • Added operation cancel operation #46330
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview2
  • Revert "Remove unnecessary code from F# templates" #46695
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview2
  • Tweak exception message for `TryParse` method not found #46574
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview2
  • Add support for parameter binding with [FromService] #46653
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview2
  • Sync shared code from runtime #46690
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview2
  • Fix nullability on DefaultEndpointFilterInvocationContext constructor #46679
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview2

Updated

  • Introducing `IProblemDetailsService.TryWriteAsync` #46680
  • Changing reflection-based json configuration #46303
    area-web-frameworks
  • Try OSX 13 again #45855
    area-infrastructure
  • Defer search for dev cert until build bind time #46296
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add schema support infrastructure #46300
    area-identity, 8.0-preview2
  • SDK Bump to `8.0.100-preview.2.23113.1` #46328
    area-infrastructure
  • Update to Helix 3.16 #46563
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • WIP: Add WebViewManager.Dispatch() method #46644
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *
  • Transport.Quic.Tests: don't fail on distros that don't have quic. #46662
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fallback using the `CultureInfo.Parent` instead of using hyphen #46637
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add CssClass property to ValidationSummary #43928
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Exclude regex and alpha constraints when SlimBuilder is used. #46227
    area-runtime
  • [AOT] Add Http.Results RouteValueDictionary overloads #46594
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
